log-puts.help: Sets an alternative to puts for logs output. Especially usefull to synchronize output with mbed-trace

log-level-platform.help: Set the log level for the platform.

log-level-network.help: Set the log level for the network.

log-level-taskpool.help: Set the log level for taskpool.

aws-log-level-global.help: Set a default log level for aws.

aws-log-level-defender.help: Set the log level for defender.

aws-log-level-shadow.help: Set the log level for aws shadow.

aws-log-level-jobs.help: Set the log level for aws jobs.

enable-serializer-overrides.help: Set this to `1` to allow the MQTT packet serializer and deserializer functions to be overridden.

mqtt-enable_metrics.help: Set this to `1` to enable anonymous metrics reporting to AWS IoT.

mqtt-response-wait-ms.help: A 'reasonable amount of time' to wait for keep-alive responses from the MQTT server.

mqtt-connections.help: When static memory only is 1, number of MQTT connections that may be opened, Defaults to 1 if undefined.

mqtt-max-in-progress-operations.help: When static memory only is 1, maximum number of MQTT operations that may be in-progress at any time. Defaults to 10 if undefined.

mqtt-connections.help: When static memory only is 1, maximum number of MQTT subscriptions at any time. Defaults to 8 if undefined.
